INTRODUCTION

Hue traditional music is a special art of Hue ancient capital city. It consists of over eighty melodies of the folk music, the chamber music, anh the court music ‚Äì ten continuous pieces of which called ‚Äúm∆∞·ªùi b·∫£n ng·ª±‚Äù are used for instrumental ensembles. Concerning Hue chamber music, there exist more than twenty four well ‚Äì known works of two different modes ‚Äì the North and the South ‚Äì namely ‚ÄúC·ªï b·∫£n, L∆∞u th·ªßy, L·ªông ƒëi·ªáp, Ph·∫©m tuy·∫øt, Nam b√¨nh, Nam ai, T∆∞∆°ng t∆∞, T·ª© ƒë·∫°i c·∫£nh, Ph√∫ l·ª•c, H√†nh v√¢n‚Ä¶, and the forth. Hue chamber Music on Huong River is a unipue art style producing the marvelous harmony among human, music, and the poetic scenry of Huong River.
